## Basic Info.

-   Name: Mercator's 1569 World Map

-   Who: 헤라르뒤스 메르카토르 [Gerardus Mercator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerardus_Mercator) (5 March 1512 – 2 December 1594)

-   When: 1569

-   Where: [Maritiem Museum](Maritime%20Museum), Rotterdam, The Netherlands

-   Size: 1.24 x 2.02 M [@brotton2014b, 110]
